{{Description|Those who confess to Sister Rosaria will be granted no absolution. All sinners shall be met with the piercing cold of punishment proportionate to the weight of their sins.}}
'''Ravaging Confession''' is [[Rosaria]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|the 2nd slash|3}}
* Rosaria cannot use this skill to appear behind larger enemies, such as [[Ruin Guard]]s.
